simpleContentPage.bodyText: Every day is taco ipsum tuesday. Black or pinto beans? Tacos, again? This will be 5 times this week and it’s only Tuesday. Pico de gallo, on the side please. I’ve been following that taco truck around all day. You see, the refried beans are really just the adhesive necessary to apply the soft tortilla to the hard taco shell. How bout a gosh darn quesadilla? Tacos for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Tacos al pastor made with adobada meat. Tacos al pastor made with adobada meat. Fish tacos: lettuce or cabbage, pico de gallo, avocado and a sour cream or citrus/mayonnaise sauce, all placed on top of a corn or flour tortilla.
Можете да не контактирате секоја работна ден од 08:00 до 20:00

articlesItem.articleContent: Make it a double there pal. Say taco one more time. Make it a double there pal. Ooh, with diced onions and a pinch of cilantro. Carne asada on corn tortillas. I think I’ve overdosed on tacos. Fish tacos: lettuce or cabbage, pico de gallo, avocado and a sour cream or citrus/mayonnaise sauce, all placed on top of a corn or flour tortilla. Tacos Al pastor/De Adobada are made of thin pork steaks seasoned with adobo seasoning, then skewered and overlapped on one another on a vertical rotisserie cooked and flame-broiled as it spins.

READ MORE ABOUT V8 AND ALL THE FABULOUS NEW FEATURES! 
Does guac cost extra? I’d have to say, those tacos are on fleek. Can you put some peppers and onions on that? I’ve been following that taco truck around all day. You see, the refried beans are really just the adhesive necessary to apply the soft tortilla to the hard taco shell. CARNITAS!! Say taco one more time. Make it a double there pal. If you were a taco, would you eat yourself? It’s taco Tuesday Monday. You see, the refried beans are really just the adhesive necessary to apply the soft tortilla to the hard taco shell. Tacos Al pastor/De Adobada are made of thin pork steaks seasoned with adobo seasoning, then skewered and overlapped on one another on a vertical rotisserie cooked and flame-broiled as it spins.

GenericProperty.Name: Logo
GenericProperty.Description: Optional. If you add a logo it'll be used in the upper left corner instead of the site name. Make sure to use a transparent logo for best results
